ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from changing the status to "Cancelled" unless the current status is "Draft". This ensures only draft orders can be cancelled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(TEXT(Salesforce_Order_Type__c) = 'ZOR'), NOT(TEXT(Salesforce_Order_Type__c) = 'ZCRM'), ISCHANGED(Status),
NOT( OR( $Permission.Integration_User, $Profile.Name = "System Administrator", AND( $User.FirstName = "Automated", $User.LastName = "Process" ), $Permission.Bypass_Order_Cancellation_Validation ) ),
OR(
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Cancelled"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Draft")) )
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only cancel the Order when its status is 'Draft'
